name: Realms of Arkania: Blade of Destiny
summary:
A legend reborn as Realms of Arkania: Blade of Destiny returns! 
 
Developed by Austrian developer Crafty Studios, Realms of Arkania – Blade of Destiny is a faithful remake of the 1992 original, adored by a generation of Role Players and one of the most successful RPG’s of the 1990’s.

alternative_names.name: Realms of Arkania: Blade of Destiny Revised

esrb.synopsis: This is a role-playing game in which players lead a band of adventures to stop an orc army. From a first-person perspective, players explore fantasy landscapes, interact with characters, and engage in various quests. Combat is turn-based, as players select weapon/magic attacks from a menu-screen of options; attacks (depicted from a 3/4-overhead perspective) are accompanied by light effects, sword slashes, and cries of pain. Splashes of blood appear as characters are struck. The dialogue occasionally references alcohol (e.g., “The bar is occupied by a lot of drunkards,” “You pay for your last beer and leave,” and “Looks like Gerbod had a little too much to drink, he is having a hard time standing.”).
